mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_BOARD (psnum, num, subject, content, hitCount, idaddr, ies, loca, loca_d, gender, age, cbn, person_c, reg_date, blind) VALUES (#{psnum}, #{num}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, #{idaddr}, #{ies}, #{loca}, #{loca_d}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{cbn}, #{person_c}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM GROUP_BOARD gb JOIN MEMBER m ON gb.num = m.num

SELECT gb.psnum, m.num, m.id, m.nickname, gb.subject, TO_CHAR(gb.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date, m.grade, m.profile_image, gb.hitCount, NVL(replyCount, 0) replyCount, NVL(boardLikeCount, 0) boardLikeCount FROM GROUP_BOARD gb JOIN MEMBER m ON gb.num = m.num JOIN GROUP_CATEGORY g ON gb.cbn = g.cbn LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) replyCount, ps_num, rpblind FROM GROUP_BOARD_REPLY WHERE rpblind = 0 GROUP BY psnum, rpblind ) c ON gb.psnum = c.psnum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT psnum, COUNT(*) boardLikeCount FROM GROUP_BOARD_FAV GROUP BY psnum ) gf ON gb.psnum = gf.psnum
ORDER BY gb.psnum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
